column2: "Na wokotwaa mu wɔ Amfipolis nye Apollonia no
column3: wɔbaa Tesalonika mbrɛ Jewfo nhyiamudan bi wɔ:"

column2: "na dɛ mbrɛ Paul tɔ yɛ no
column3: ɔkɔr mu wɔ hɔn nkyɛn ahomgyeda ebiasa
column4: na ɔnye hɔn yɛɛ mpɛnsampɛnsamu wɔ kyerɛwnsɛm no mu
column6: "na obuee asɛm no do kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɔn mu kofee dɛ otwar dɛ Kraest no hu amandze
column7: na ɔsoɛr fi ewufo mu; na ɔkae sɔɔw do dɛ
column8: Jesus a meka hom no ho asɛm yi ɔnoara nye Kraest no."

column2: "Na hɔn mu binom gyee dzii
column3: na wɔdze hɔnho bɔɔ Paul nye Silas ho
column4: a Griikfo nyamesurofo nyimpadodow pii
column5: nye mbaa a wɔyɛ etsitsir so pii ka ho."

column2: "Na Jewfo no dze
column3: nyinkun kaa hɔn
column4: na wɔfaa ehuhufo no mu nyimpa bɔn bi kaa hɔn ho
column6: na wɔmaa kurow no mu yɛɛ wentwiwentwi
column7: na wɔkɛkyeer Jason dan ho hwehwɛɛ dɛ woyi hɔn pue kɛma nkorɔfo no."

column2: "Na woennhu hɔn no
column3: wotwuuw Jason nye enuanom no bi adze kɛmaa kurow no mu etsitsir no
column4: na wɔtseatseaa mu dɛ
column5: Yinom a wɔadan wiadze tsir esi famu yi

column2: "hɔn na Jason agye hɔn esie
column3: na hɔn nyina yɛ dza otsia Kaesar mbransɛm no
column4: eso wɔka dɛ ɔhen fofor bi so wɔ hɔ

column2: "Na iyi haaw nyimpadodow no nye kurow no mu etsitsir a wɔtsee yinom no."
"Na wɔmaa Jason nye nkaa no dzii egyinamu maa hɔn no
column3: wɔmaa wɔkɔree."

column2: "Na ntsɛmara enuanom no gyaa Paul nye Silas kwan anadwe kɔr Beroa
column3: na wodur hɔ no
column4: wɔkɔr Jewfo nhyiamudan no mu."

column2: "Na iyinom yɛ enyimdzefo sen hɔn a wɔwɔ Tesalonika
column3: osiandɛ wosiesiee hɔn adwen mu tsiee asɛm no
column4: na wɔhwehwɛɛ kyerɛwnsɛm no mu daa
column5: kyerɛ dɛ ndzɛmba yi tse dɛm anaa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hɔn mu dodowara gyee dzii
column3: nye Griikfo mbaa a wɔwɔ dzin
column4: nye mbarimba no so pii."

column2: "Na Jewfo a wɔwɔ Tesalonika tsee dɛ Paul akɛka Nyankopɔn asɛm no wɔ Beroa so no
column3: wɔbaa hɔ so na wobohuur nyimpadodow no akoma na wɔhaaw hɔn."

column2: "Na afei ntsɛmara enuanom no gyaa Paul kwan dɛ ɔnkɔ po ho
column3: na Silas nye Timoti dze
column4: wɔtsenaa hɔ."

column2: "Na hɔn a wokegyaa Paul kwan no dze no kɔree kodur Atens
column3: na ɔmaa hɔn nkra dɛ Silas nye Timoti mbra ne nkyɛn ntsɛntsɛm no
column4: wosii mu kɔree."

column2: "Na Paul rotweɔn hɔn wɔ Atens no
column3: ohun dɛ abosonsom ahyɛ kurow no ma
column4: na ɔyɛɛ no ahomtsew pii."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔnye Jewfo nye nyamesurofo no yɛɛ nhwehwɛmu dzendzenndzen wɔ nhyiamudan mu
column3: na guado so daa nyina ɔnye hɔn a ohyiaa hɔn no dzii anokɔnkɔn."

column2: "Na Epikurufo nye Stoafo enyansapɛfo bi so nye no dzii anokɔnkɔn. Na binom see dɛ
column3: Ɔkasakasafo yi se dɛn nye yi? Binom so see dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛ ɔka anana abosom bi ho asɛm: osiandɛ ɔkaa Jesus nye wusoɛr no ho asɛmpa no."

column2: "Na wosuoo no mu dze no kɔr Areopagus dɛ
column3: Ana yebotum ehu nkyerɛkyerɛ fofor a erekyerɛ yi?"

column2: "Na edze nsɛm fofor bi aba hɛn asomu: dɛm ntsi yɛpɛ dɛ yɛtse ndzɛmba yi ase."
"(Osiandɛ nna Atensefo nye ahɔho a wɔabɛtsena hɔ nyina
column3: wonnya biribiara ho adagyer ka dɛ wɔbɛka anaadɛ wobetsie asɛm fofor bi.)"

column2: "Na Paul gyinaa Areopagus finimfin
column3: na ɔsee dɛ: Atens mbarimba
column4: mehu dɛ hom wɔ gyedzi wɔ ndzɛmba pii mu dodow."

column2: "Na murutwa mu
column3: na mohwɛɛ hom adze a hom sɔr no
column4: muhun afɔrmbukyia so a wɔakyerɛw do dɛ
column5: NYAME A WONNYIM NO DZE A. Dɛm ntsi nyia hom nnyim na hom sɔr no no
column6: ɔno na mereka no ho asɛm kyerɛ hom yi."

column2: "Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛɛ wiadze nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyina
column3: ɔno a ɔyɛ sor nye asaase wura no ntsi
column4: ɔnntse asɔrdan a wɔdze nsa ayɛ mu;"

column2: "eso wɔnndze nyimpa nsa som no
column3: dɛ gyama ohia no biribi
column4: osiandɛ ɔno na ɔma nyimpa nyina nkwa nye ahom nye adze nyina;"

column2: "na ofi adze kor mu yɛɛ nyimpa amanaman nyina
column3: dɛ wɔntsena asaase enyi nyina
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn hyɛber
column5: nye hɔn tsenabea he too hɔ
column8: dɛ bi a hɔn nsa bɛka no
column10: naaso ɔnye hɛn mu biara ntamu kwan nnwar koraa:"

column2: "na no mu na yɛtse ase
column3: na yɛkeka hɛnho
column4: na yɛwɔ hɔ; dɛ mbrɛ homankasa hom ndwomkyerɛwfo binom aka dɛ
column5: Hɛn nyinara so yɛ ne mbanana."

column2: "Na osiandɛ yɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ne mbanana ntsi
column3: ɔnnsɛ dɛ yesusu dɛ Nyame suban tse dɛ sika anaa dwetɛ
column4: anaa ɔbo
column5: edwin a nyimpa dze ne nyansaa nye n'adwen edzi."

column2: "Na mber a wonnyim no dze
column3: Nyankopɔn buu enyi guu do
column4: na afei dze
column5: ɔhyɛ nyimpa nyina wɔ mbea nyina dɛ wonnu hɔnho
column7: "osiandɛ ɔahyɛ da bi a ɔnam ɔbarimba bi a oeyi no esi hɔ no do bobu wiadze atsɛn wɔ tsenenee mu; ɔno na ɔama ɔasoɛr efi ewufo mu dze esi no pi ama nyimpa nyina dɛ wɔmfa ndzi dase."

column2: "Na wɔtsee ewufo soɛr no
column3: binom sii atwetwe
column4: na binom so see dɛ
column5: Yebetsie wo wɔ asɛm yi ho bio."

column2: "Na mbrɛ Paul sii fii hɔn nkyɛn kɔree nye no."
"Naaso nyimpa bi dze hɔnho bɔɔ no ho na wɔgyee dzii: hɔn mu bi nye Dionisius Areopagusnyi no
column3: na ɔbaa bi a ne dzin dze Damaris
column4: nye binom a wɔka hɔn ho no."
